column1: #Text=The mountain before them was shaped like a cone and was so tall that its point was lost in the clouds .
#Text=Directly facing the place where Jim had stopped was an arched opening leading to a broad stairway .

#Text=The stairs were cut in the rock inside the mountain , and they were broad and not very steep , because they circled around like a cork-screw , and at the arched opening where the flight began the circle was quite big .
#Text=At the foot of the stairs was a sign reading :
#Text=These steps lead to the Land of the Gargoyles .
#Text=" I wonder how Jim is ever going to draw the buggy up so many stairs , " said Dorothy , gravely .
#Text=" No trouble at all , " declared the horse , with a contemptuous neigh .
#Text=" Still , I do n't care to drag any passengers .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Then you 'll have to boost the buggy-wheels , that 's all ,  answered Jim .

#Text= We 'll try it , anyway , " said the Wizard .

column1: #Text=" It 's the only way to get out of the Valley of Voe .

#Text= No place at all , " answered the man with the braids ; " that is , not recently .

#Text= Are we only half way up ?

column1: #Text=" But as I have never been in either direction , down or up , since I arrived , I cannot be positive whether it is exactly half way or not .
